internal.content:
---
title: SAP Connector
---           

## Configuration before upgrade
- Stop transactions between Maximo and SAP
- Process all transactions in the Queues
- Resolve any SAP integration errors in Maximo
- Disable the External System SAP2005
- Stop the MX7612 Maximo server
- Backup Maximo 7612 db

## Configuration after upgrade
- Define the Message provider and queues  (Kafka or JMS)
- Assign queues to External System SAP2005
- Configure KAFKA Cron task (If using Kafka, update the settings according to [MIF guide](https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSLKT6_7.6.1.2/com.ibm.mif.doc/providers/c_mssg_providers_op.html))
- Disable JMSQSEQCONSUMER Cron task (If using Kafka)
- Generate APIKey for integration user sapadmin
- Change connection parameters in SAP PO / Maximo HTTP Channel
- Enable external system SAP2005

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: SAP Connector
---           

## Configuration before upgrade
- Stop transactions between Maximo and SAP
- Process all transactions in the Queues
- Resolve any SAP integration errors in Maximo
- Disable the External System SAP2005
- Stop the MX7612 Maximo server
- Backup Maximo 7612 db

## Configuration after upgrade
- Define the Message provider and queues  (Kafka or JMS)
- Assign queues to External System SAP2005
- Configure KAFKA Cron task (If using Kafka, update the settings according to [MIF guide](https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSLKT6_7.6.1.2/com.ibm.mif.doc/providers/c_mssg_providers_op.html))
- Disable JMSQSEQCONSUMER Cron task (If using Kafka)
- Generate APIKey for integration user sapadmin
- Change connection parameters in SAP PO / Maximo HTTP Channel
- Enable external system SAP2005
